Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Authorizes Terrence D. McCracken to receive certain service credit with the New York state and local employees' retirement system
Summary: Authorizes Terrence D. McCracken to receive service credit with the New York state and local employees' retirement system for service as a bus operator for the Niagara Frontier Transit Authority Metro System, Inc.
ActClause: AN ACT to authorize Terrence D. McCracken to receive certain service credit with the New York state and local employees' retirement system
